register.heading: Register on Streamly
register.backButtonLabel: Already have an account ? Sign in
register.usernameDescription: This is the name other users will know you by. You change it later
register.emailDescription: We may use your email for sending account-related notifications
register.passwordDescription: The password must contain at least 8 characters
register.successAlertDescription: A verification email has been sent to your inbox. If you don't see it check your spam folder

login.heading: Login to Streamly
login.backButtonLabel: Don't have an account ? Sign up
login.loginDescription: Your username or email that you used during registration
login.passwordDescription: The password you used during registration
login.pinDescription: Enter the code from your authentication app

resetPassword.heading: Reset Password
resetPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account ? Sign in
resetPassword.emailDescription: The email you used during registration
resetPassword.successAlertDescription: We have sent a password reset link to your email. If you have enabled Telegram notifications, the link was sent there as well

newPassword.heading: New password
newPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account ? Sign in
newPassword.passwordDescription: The password you used during registration
newPassword.passwordRepeatDescription: Repeat your new password for confirmation

deactivate.heading: Deactivate Account
deactivate.pinDescription: A code has been sent to your email. If you enabled Telegram notifications, we sent the code there as well
deactivate.emailDescription: The email you used during registration
deactivate.passwordDescription: The password you used during registration
deactivate.successMessage: You have successfully deactivated your account

header.heading: Settings
header.description: Here you can manage your settings

header.heading: Profile
header.description: Customize your profile by changing your avatar, personal information and social media links. Update your information so that other users can learn more about you

avatar.heading: Profile Image

confirmModal.heading: Remove Avatar
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to remove your profile image ? This action cannot be undone

avatar.info: Supported formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, WEBP or GIF. Max size: 10MB

info.heading: Profile Settings
info.usernameDescription: This is how other users will know you
info.displayNameDescription: You can use uppercase letters in your display name as you wish
info.bioDescription: The information about yourself should contain no more than 300 characters

createForm.heading: Social Media Links
createForm.urlDescription: Where does this link lead ? Please enter the full URL, e.g: https://youtube.com/test

socialLinks.successReorderMessage: Order of social media links changed
socialLinks.errorReorderMessage: Error changing order of social media links

header.heading: Account
header.description: Manage your account settings, including access changes, security and deactivation options
header.securityDescription: Set up two-factor authentication and auto-renewals for enhanced protection of your data
header.deactivationDescription: If you want to temporarily or permanently disabled your account, use this option. Be aware of the consequences

password.heading: Account Password
password.oldPasswordDescription: Enter your old password to verify your identity before changing your password. This is necessary to ensure the security of your account
password.newPasswordDescription: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long. It is recommended to use special characters for added security

twoFactor.heading: TOTP Authentication
twoFactor.description: Enhance your account security by enabling TOTP authentication. This additional layer of protection requires entering a unique code, making your account less vulnerable to unauthorized access

enable.heading: Enabling TOTP
enable.qrInstructions: Scan the QR code to add TOTP
enable.pinDescription: Please enter the 6-digit code provided by your authentication app

disable.heading: Are you sure you want to disable TOTP ?
disable.message: Disabling TOTP authentication will make your account less secure. Are you sure you want to proceed ?

deactivation.heading: Account Deactivation
deactivation.description: After deactivating your account, you will not be able to log in. Your account will be completely deleted after 7 days. Until then, you can contact support to restore access and unlock your account

confirmModal.heading: Deactivation Confirmation
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account ? Access can only be restored within 7 days

header.heading: Appearance
header.description: Customize the look of the website interface to your linking. Choose a theme and language that make your experience more comfortable

theme.heading: Change Theme
theme.description: You can choose a dark or light theme for the website interface
theme.successMessage: The website theme has been successfully changed

language.heading: Website Language
language.description: Select the language that will be used on the website
language.successMessage: The website language has been successfully changed
language.errorMessage: Error while changing the website language

color.heading: Accent Color
color.description: Choose an accent color for the interface
